manifest.description: Installs ALOT, ALOT Addons, and MEUITM with ALOT defaults

failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui crashed or returned a non-zero error code during preinstallation scan. Check the installer log for more info.

failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui crashed or returned a non-zero error code during unpacking of DLC SFARs. Check the installer log for more info. The game is in an inconsistent state and may not be functional.

failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui crashed or returned a non-zero error code during scanning of existing game textures. Check the installer log for more info.

failureinfo.failedtopmessage: Detected incorrectly installed mod or missing dependent DLC

failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: Texture map file is missing - has this game been migrated to a new system or user account?

failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: Texture map file is corrupted and unusable - you will need to delete the game and then reinstall so the texture map can be rebuilt.

failureinfo.failedtopmessage: Files were added after previous texture installation
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: Adding files/mods after textures have been installed is unsupported and will cause significant issues in the game. You must restore your game to vanilla to use the installer as this installation. Do not install files outside of ALOT Installer after textures are installed.

failureinfo.failedtopmessage: Files were removed after previous texture installation
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: Removal of package files after textures have been installed will prevent further modifications to the game with ALOT Installer due to texture map desynchronization.

failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui crashed or returned a non-zero error code during installation of textures. Check the installer log for more info. The game is not in a usable state.

failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui crashed or returned a non-zero error code during removal of empty mipmaps. Check the installer log for more info. The game is in an inconsistent state.

failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui crashed or returned a non-zero error code during recompression of game files. Check the installer log for more info. The game is in an inconsistent state.

failureinfo.failedtopmessage: Failed to install remaining texture markers
failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui crashed or returned a non-zero error code during application of texture markers on non-modded files. Check the installer log for more info. The game is in a functional state, but texture settings and proper markers have not been applied.

failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check installer log for more information
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui crashed or returned a non-zero error code after textures were installed, during the texture verification step. Check the installer log for more info.

failureinfo.failedtopmessage: Files from existing texture installation found
failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Game needs to be fully deleted and reinstalled
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: Detected files that were part of a texture installation, however the current game is not marked as having a texture installation. The game should be fully deleted (not uninstalled) to remove these files.

failureinfo.failedtopmessage: Failed to apply texture fixes before install
failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check installer log for more info
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui failed to fix known issues in some of your installed mods before installation. Check the installer log for more information.

failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check installer log for more info
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: A Lot of Videos (ALOV) mod installs before textures are installed. The installer encountered an error during this procedure. Check the installer log for more information.

failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check installer log for more info
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui exited prematurely during texture install. Check the installer log for more information.

failureinfo.failedtopmessage: Failed to set ME1 to Large Address Aware (LAA)
failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check installer log for more info
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: MassEffectModderNoGui was unable to set Mass Effect to be Large Address Aware (LAA). This will cause Mass Effect to crash due to memory limitations. Check the installer log for more information.

failureinfo.failedtopmessage: Failed to set texture installation info
failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check installer log for more info
failureinfo.failedheadermessage: ALOT Installer was unable to set the texture installation info for the game. Check the installer log for more information.

failureinfo.failedtopmessage: Failed to install additional components for a mod
failureinfo.failedbottommessage: Check installer log for more info
failureinfo.failedheadermessagige: ALOT Installer was unable to install additional non-texture components for a specific texture mod. Check the installer log for more information.

tutorial.tooltip: A tutorial with pictures that walks through the installation steps.
Comparison sliders between ALOT and unmodded, by Ian Moore.

manifestfile.author: CDAMJC
manifestfile.recommendationreason: Main file, required

manifestfile.author: CDAMJC
manifestfile.recommendationreason: If using any Blur tribute textures, ensure the Blur mesh mods are installed prior to installing MEUITM2.

manifestfile.author: CATACHRISM
manifestfile.recommendationreason: Fully customizable with both vanilla friendly and ME3 continuity options where applicable

manifestfile.author: CATACHRISM
manifestfile.recommendationreason: If using Blur tribute textures for Thane and/or Jack, ensure the Blur mesh mods are installed prior to installing MEUITM2.

packagefile.sourcename: MEUITM2\Mods\ME2 Liara Green Outfit ME3 Style.mem
MEUITM2\ME2 Turian NPC armors Vanilla Lights.mem

manifestfile.recommendationreason: Significantly improves the static shadows in level environments

manifestfile.author: CreeperLava
manifestfile.recommendationreason: Significantly improves the static shadows in level environments

manifestfile.friendlyname: Improved Static Lighting for ME3 - Lite
manifestfile.author: CreeperLava
manifestfile.recommendationreason: Significantly improves the static shadows in level environments. Only denoised, uses less memory than the full version at the cost of quality. Install this if you experience crashes with other mods installed.

file.tooltipname: Improved Static Lighting for ME3 - Lite
file.torrentfilename: Improved Static Lighting for ME3 - Lite.zip
file.filename: Improved Static Lighting for ME3 - Lite-363-2021-12-0-1604673604.zip

manifestfile.friendlyname: Improved Static Lighting for ME3 - Full
manifestfile.author: CreeperLava
manifestfile.recommendationreason: Significantly improves the static shadows in level environments. Denoised and higher resolution. Uses more memory than the Lite version. Only recommended if you aren't using other mods.

file.tooltipname: Improved Static Lighting for ME3 - Full
file.torrentfilename: Improved Static Lighting for ME3 - Full.zip
file.filename: Improved Static Lighting for ME3 - Full-363-2021-12-0-1604676675.zip

dlcprecheck.failuremessage: Improved Static Lighting for ME3 - Full cannot be installed while Project Variety is installed. Use the Lite version instead.

dlcprecheck.friendlyname: Expanded Galaxy Mod + ISL Full Check
dlcprecheck.failuremessage: Improved Static Lighting for ME3 - Full cannot be installed while Expanded Galaxy Mod is installed. Use the Lite version instead.

manifestfile.author: Ellise
manifestfile.recommendationreason: Very good face textures for default FemShep (not custom), but a little different from vanilla and thus up to personal preference

manifestfile.recommendationreason: Very good face textures for default BroShep (not custom), but a little different from vanilla and thus up to personal preference

preinstallmod.author: Audemus
preinstallmod.recommendationreason: Significantly upgrades the pre-rendered videos for Mass Effect

preinstallmod.author: Audemus

preinstallmod.friendlyname: A Lot of Videos for ME3 3.0 - Basegame (1080p)
preinstallmod.author: Mellin
preinstallmod.recommendationreason: Significantly upgrades the pre-rendered videos for Mass Effect 3. This file covers the basegame, no DLC or mods.

preinstallmod.friendlyname: A Lot of Videos for ME3 3.0 - Official DLC (1080p)
preinstallmod.author: Mellin
preinstallmod.recommendationreason: Significantly upgrades the pre-rendered videos for Mass Effect 3. This file covers the official BioWare DLCs.

preinstallmod.friendlyname: A Lot of Videos for ME3 3.0.0.0 - Third Party Mods (1080p)
preinstallmod.shortname: ALOV for ME3 - Third Party Mods (1080p)
preinstallmod.author: Mellin
preinstallmod.recommendationreason: Upgrades third party mod's videos where permission was granted, and they are not using 1080p videos already.
